days.notes: Travel day from Beijing to Harbin. High transportation cost for high-speed train.
Full day in Harbin with Sun Island and Siberian Tiger Park visits.
Travel day Harbin to Tianjin. Shopping at Ancient Culture Street included.
Travel day Tianjin to Xi'an. Terracotta Warriors visit (120 CNY) and travel to site included. Huaqing Palace and Muslim Quarter.
Full day in Xi'an: City Wall (54 CNY + 45 bike rental), Giant Wild Goose Pagoda (50 CNY), Shaanxi History Museum (free), Tang Dynasty Night City (free).
Travel day Xi'an to Suzhou. Humble Administrator's Garden (80 CNY), Suzhou Museum (free), Pingjiang Road, Shantang Street. Higher shopping budget for authentic Suzhou silk.
Travel day Suzhou to Hangzhou (short trip 85 min). West Lake (free + 55 boat), Lingyin Temple (75 CNY). High shopping budget for Longjing tea (200 CNY) and Hefang Street (60 CNY).
Long travel day Hangzhou to Guilin (8+ hours). Li River Cruise (215 CNY), Impression Liu Sanjie show (238 CNY). Overnight in Guilin before cruise.
Li River cruise to Yangshuo (220 CNY transportation), Yulong River rafting (120 CNY), Ten-Mile Gallery cycling (free + 40 bike rental), Moon Hill (15 CNY).
Travel day Yangshuo to Zhangjiajie. Zhangjiajie Forest Park (228 CNY), Bailong Elevator (72 CNY), Tianzi Mountain cable car (67 CNY), Tianmen Fox Fairy show (280 CNY). Very high cost day.

recommendations: Skip House of Dancing Water show in Macau (saves €107 / 898 MOP) - reduces trip to €628
Downgrade Hong Kong accommodation from Holiday Inn Golden Mile (850 CNY) to budget hostel/guesthouse in Kowloon (400-500 CNY) - saves €45-58
Reduce Day 13 shopping budget from 450 CNY to 200 CNY (skip luxury Harbour City, focus on Senado Square food gifts) - saves €32
Skip Ngong Ping 360 cable car, take bus instead (saves 235 CNY / €30.13) - still can visit Tian Tan Buddha
Combined savings option 1: Skip show + downgrade accommodation + reduce shopping = saves €184, brings trip to €551 (10% over)
Combined savings option 2: Skip show + take bus instead of cable car = saves €137, brings trip to €598 (20% over)
Alternative: Split Trip 7 into two separate trips (Guangzhou-Shenzhen as Trip 7A, Hong Kong-Macau as Trip 7B) to allow €500 budget for each
Skip Tianmen Fox Fairy show (280 CNY / €35.90) - reduces day to €197.69
Book accommodation in Zhangjiajie city center instead of Wulingyuan (saves 150-200 CNY / €19-26) - but adds transportation time to park
Consider taking cable car one direction only (saves 34 CNY / €4.36)

recommendations.issue: 82.7% of budget utilized - tight but manageable
recommendations: Reduce Longjing tea purchase budget from 200 CNY to 100 CNY (buy smaller quantity or lower grade) - saves €12.82
Skip Impression West Lake show if not essential (320 CNY entertainment cost not yet in budget) - would exceed budget if added
Choose simpler lunch option than Lou Wai Lou (250 CNY) - save €15-20 by eating at Grandma's Home instead (120 CNY)
Book all trains and accommodations 20-30 days in advance for 10-20% discounts
Use overnight trains for long routes (Harbin-Tianjin, Tianjin-Xi'an, Xi'an-Suzhou) to save one night accommodation per trip - saves €40-60 per night
Eat at local restaurants instead of tourist areas - can reduce meal costs by 20-30%
Skip optional entertainment shows: Total optional entertainment = 1,163 CNY (€149.10) - Ice Bar + Hai River Cruise + Tang Dynasty Show + Kunqu Opera + Impression West Lake
Purchase museum tickets online in advance for discounts (5-15% off)
Use metro/public transit instead of taxis within cities - saves €5-10 per day
Bring reusable water bottle and snacks to reduce incidental spending
Consider travel insurance with medical coverage - not in budget but highly recommended for 13-day trip across multiple regions

budget_summary.budget_health: Overall HEALTHY - under total budget by €1,043.33, but Trip 7 requires optimization

notes: Budget calculations completed for all 13 days across 7 trips. Exchange rate used: 7.8 CNY = 1 EUR (with 5% buffer). Key findings: (1) Trip 7 (Guangzhou-Shenzhen-Hong Kong-Macau) significantly exceeds €500 budget due to Hong Kong/Macau premium pricing, especially accommodation (850 CNY/night) and entertainment (House of Dancing Water 898 MOP); (2) Days 8, 10, 13 are the most expensive single days; (3) Overall trip is under total budget of €3,500 (7 trips × €500) by €1,043.33; (4) Recommended to reallocate budget from under-budget trips or optimize Trip 7 as detailed in recommendations. Currency notes: Mainland China uses CNY, Hong Kong uses HKD (≈0.88 CNY), Macau uses MOP (≈0.93 CNY). All shopping budgets are estimates based on typical purchases at each location. Optional entertainment shows totaling 1,163 CNY (€149) not included in base calculations - user can add selectively. Local transportation within cities (metro/taxi estimated 20-50 CNY/day) not separately itemized but included in activity costs where relevant. Budget calculations cross-verified against timeline.json to ensure all meals, accommodations, attractions, entertainment, shopping, and transportation accounted for.
